summary: The United States Women's National Soccer Team (USWNT) is the best in women's soccer. They've won four Women's World Cup titles and five Olympic gold medals. They've been ranked number one in the world for over 13 years, longer than any other team. The team has also won many awards and settled a lawsuit to get paid equally to the men's team. They are celebrated in their country and have inspired many young athletes.
title: United States women's national soccer team
